title: Gingerbread
description: In this dark retelling of a classic fairy tale, Hansel and Gretel are twins living in the rural town of Brimstone, at the mercy of their selfish and manipulative mother. Desiring to be free of the burden of caring for children who have come of age, Mother concocts a plan to abandon them far from home. But Hansel and Gretel are crafty and resourceful, prompting Mother to be even more devious. However, the twins find refuge at Ginger’s Diner, a refuge which quickly becomes a prison. Held captive by a vile witch, Hansel and Gretel realize there is only one way to escape, a way which will change their relationship forever…
author: Gabriel Daemon
